pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā bhikkhūnaṁ anekapariyāyena vinayakathaṁ katheti, vinayassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, vinayapariyattiyā vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, ādissa ādissa āyasmato upālissa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.4_0: “bhagavā kho anekapariyāyena vinayakathaṁ katheti, vinayassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, vinayapariyattiyā vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, ādissa ādissa āyasmato upālissa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.5_0: Handa mayaṁ, āvuso, āyasmato upālissa santike vinayaṁ pariyāpuṇāmā”ti, te ca bahū bhikkhū therā ca navā ca majjhimā ca āyasmato upālissa santike vinayaṁ pariyāpuṇanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.7_0: “etarahi kho, āvuso, bahū bhikkhū therā ca navā ca majjhimā ca āyasmato upālissa santike vinayaṁ pariyāpuṇanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.8_0: Sace ime vinaye pakataññuno bhavissanti amhe yenicchakaṁ yadicchakaṁ yāvadicchakaṁ ākaḍḍhissanti parikaḍḍhissanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.10_0: Atha kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadanti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.11_0: “kiṁ panimehi khuddānukhuddakehi sikkhāpadehi uddiṭṭhehi, yāvadeva kukkuccāya vihesāya vilekhāya saṁvattantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.12_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.17_0: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, vinayaṁ vivaṇṇessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.19_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.20.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṁ vadeyya—‘kiṁ panimehi khuddānukhuddakehi sikkhāpadehi uddiṭṭhehi, yāvadeva kukkuccāya vihesāya vilekhāya saṁvattantī’ti, sikkhāpadavivaṇṇake pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:2.1.6_0: uddisante vā uddisāpente vā sajjhāyaṁ vā karonte.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:2.1.8_0: “kiṁ panimehi khuddānukhuddakehi sikkhāpadehi uddiṭṭhehi, yāvadeva kukkuccāya vihesāya vilekhāya saṁvattantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:2.1.9_0: “Ye imaṁ pariyāpuṇanti tesaṁ kukkuccaṁ hoti, vihesā hoti, vilekhā hoti, ye imaṁ na pariyāpuṇanti tesaṁ kukkuccaṁ na hoti vihesā na hoti vilekhā na hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:2.1.9_1: Anuddiṭṭhaṁ idaṁ varaṁ, anuggahitaṁ idaṁ varaṁ, apariyāpuṭaṁ idaṁ varaṁ, adhāritaṁ idaṁ varaṁ, vinayo vā antaradhāyatu, ime vā bhikkhū appakataññuno hontū”ti upasampannassa vinayaṁ vivaṇṇeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:2.2.1_0: Upasampanne upasampannasaññī vinayaṁ vivaṇṇeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:2.2.2_0: Upasampanne vematiko vinayaṁ vivaṇṇeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:2.2.3_0: Upasampanne anupasampannasaññī vinayaṁ vivaṇṇeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:2.2.5_0: Anupasampannassa vinayaṁ vā aññaṁ vā dhammaṁ vivaṇṇeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:2.3.2_0: na vivaṇṇetukāmo, “iṅgha tvaṁ suttante vā gāthāyo vā abhidhammaṁ vā pariyāpuṇassu, pacchā vinayaṁ pariyāpuṇissasī”ti bhaṇati,
